channel.title: Posts on Adam Brocklehurst
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Adam Brocklehurst

item.title: Making ASCII GIFs
item.description: Thanks to a combination of a little snow in the UK, a cancelled flight, and a lot of rain in Lisbon, I recently ended up spending a day stuck in a hotel room. So I did what any bored software engineer does, mess about and write some code. A couple of days earlier at work, we updated our Github slack integration. Github has released an updated version for non-enterprise users that was much prettier and gave a lot of nice functionality from slack commands rather than having to go to an admin page.

item.title: Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Adam. I’m a software engineer who really loves blogs. I, however, really suck at writing. In university I once managed to get 19% on an essay. I’d love to be able to write well-articulated blog posts that can excite readers about topics I am passionate about, and the only way I am going to get better at that is by doing it. So this blog is for me to get better at writing technical (and some non-technical) blog posts, and hopefully at some point along the way they will become readable and enjoyable.
